meanings.sent1: The teacher preassigns homework before the weekend.
meanings.sent2: She always preassigns tasks to her team members for better organization.
meanings.sent3: The robot preassigns its cleaning schedule to avoid missing any spots.
meanings.sent4: The captain preassigns roles to the team members like a strategic chess player.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock preassigns the wake-up time to ensure punctuality.

meanings.definition: To designate or allocate in advance
meanings.sent1: The event planner preassigns seats for the VIP guests.
meanings.sent2: The airline preassigns seats to passengers for a smoother boarding process.
meanings.sent3: The computer program preassigns tasks to different processors for efficiency.
meanings.sent4: The chef preassigns cooking stations to the culinary students like a master conductor.
meanings.sent5: The scheduler preassigns time slots to each appointment to avoid overlaps.
